original_title: PFL Regular Season 2022 - PFL 5: Scheffel vs. Cappelozza
overview: The PFL 5 mixed martial arts event for the 2022 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on June 24, 2022 at the Overtime Elite Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. This marked the fifth regular season event of the tournament and included fights in the Heavyweight and Featherweight divisions.
title: PFL Regular Season 2022 - PFL 5: Scheffel vs. Cappelozza
